meanings.definition: The skill or practice of rowing a boat using oarsmanships.
meanings.sent1: His oarsmanships were evident as he effortlessly guided the boat through the water.
meanings.sent2: She developed her oarsmanships over years of training on the lake.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the best oarsmanships in town was fierce.
meanings.sent4: His oarsmanships were like poetry in motion on the tranquil lake.
meanings.sent5: The oarsmanships of the rowing team were crucial for their victory in the race.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being an expert oarsman.
meanings.sent1: His oarsmanships were unmatched, earning him the title of champion.
meanings.sent2: The coach admired the oarsmanships of the seasoned rower.
meanings.sent3: His oarsmanships shone brightly during the regatta, impressing everyone.
meanings.sent4: In the world of rowing, his oarsmanships were a beacon of excellence.
meanings.sent5: The oarsmanships of the veteran rower inspired the younger athletes to improve.

meanings.definition: The art or technique of rowing with oarsmanships.
meanings.sent1: Learning the oarsmanships of rowing requires patience and dedication.
meanings.sent2: The beauty of her oarsmanships was admired by all who watched her row.
meanings.sent3: His unique oarsmanships made him stand out in the rowing community.
meanings.sent4: The oarsmanships of the rowing team were in perfect harmony during the race.
meanings.sent5: Mastering the oarsmanships of rowing is a rewarding challenge for enthusiasts.
